|cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 710 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = 1 |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q256CFIG; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = 1 |nvramsize = 64 |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 34:97:F6 |oui = 34:97:F6 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.14;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.0, LED, AiMesh, AiProtection, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;2; ,,, Single Chip Bluetooth 4.0 (UART/HCI);Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;;1; ,,, 9-Channel LED Lighting Driver;Texas Instruments;LP5523;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = HIVEDOT_XX_2G, HIVEDOT_XX_5G, |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Pegatron |manuf_model = HiveDot |manuf_rev = 1.01 |is_manuf = |tpfirmware = LEDE Project |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/12/2017 |estreldate = 04/30/2017 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B076GLQ1BT |asin_country = UK |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Seamless Wi-Fi Signal in Every Corner of Home "HIVE_DOT REV:1.01" and "1645" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3422239 board]. :This device is a Lyra Mini including 2.4GHz 802.11b/g/n (2x2), BT4.0 and 5GHz 802.11an/ac (2x2) transmitting and receiving function. "F/W ver.: 3.0.0.4_380_6597, H/W ver.: B1" is silkscreened on the sticker. {{see also|ASUS MAP-AC1300|Pegatron}} *[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Compatibility Models: :- [[ASUS Lyra]] (MAP-AC2200) :- ASUS Lyra Mini (MAP-AC1300) :- [[ASUS Lyra Trio]] (MAP-AC1750) :- [[ASUS Lyra Voice]] (AC2200) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-lyra-mini-review ''ASUS Lyra Mini review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.redeszone.net/asus/lyra-mini-map-ac1300/ ''Asus Lira Mini (MAP-AC1300)'' on '''RedesZone'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/107730138-post7.html On '''HardwareZone''' forums] (Maylyn's post) *[http://wl500g.info/entry.php?10135-ASUS-Blue-Cave-amp-Lyra On '''wl500g.info''' forums] (Omega's blog) ==Notes== *'''Banish Wi-Fi Dead Spots''' – The tri-node system delivers perfect :Wi-Fi coverage to every corner of your home. *'''Smooth Connections, Always''' – As you move around your home, :you’ll always be automatically connected to the best possible signal. *'''Commercial-grade Security''' - AiProtection blocks security threats :to protect all devices on your home network. *'''You’re in Control''' – ''ASUS Lyra app'' allows no-fuss setup, lets manage :bandwidth and informs you instantly about any technical problems. *'''Family Overview''' – The feature lets you easily view and control each :family members’ internet and app usage from your mobile device. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/ipq4018 IPQ4018] @717 MHz Quad Core Processor *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4 GHz), 802.11an/ac (5 GHz) *Wireless Speed: 400Mbps for 2.4 GHz, 867Mbps for 5 GHz *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Features: Wave2, MU-MIMO, Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM :Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control, IPv6 *Antenna: 3x internal antennas *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 1x LAN GbE *Operation Mode: Router, Access point *Dimensions: (132mm Dia x 33mm H) :132mm x 132mm x 33mm (LxWxH) (without bezel) *Weight: 450 grams (15.87 ounces)/station *Power: DC 5V/2A adapter ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
###########################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros little-endian ARM platform, linux-3.14.x
# SOC: IPQ401x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	SPI, NAND

export MAP-AC1300 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y SSH=y QCA=y IPQ40XX=y PARENTAL2=y YANDEXDNS=y  
 VPNC=y EMAIL=y OPENVPN=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y EBTABLES=y AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="MAP-AC1300" 
 NVRAM_64K=y TUNEK="n" OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
 TEMPROOTFS=y DEBUGFS=y CFGSYNC=y USB="USB" XHCI=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y WLCEVENTD=y 
 REDIRECT_DNAME=y \
	UBI=y UBIFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	LP5523=y BT_CONN=y DETWAN=y SINGLE_SSID=y SSID_AMAPS=y \
	ATF=y QCA_TW_AUTO_BAND4=y STAINFO=y JFFS2USERICON=y HIVE_LIB=y HIVE_BIN=y \
	NATNL_AIHOME=y WIFICLONE=y QCA_VAP_LOCALMAC=y BWDPI=y PSISTLOG=y LYRA_HIDE=y 
        DUAL_BACKHAUL=n ETHBACKHAUL=y MASTER_DET=y
}} ==See also== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *ASUS Lyra Mini - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
